data.title: I Need depressing tunes
data.meta_description:
Cold and Staind are probably the most depressing bands out there but maybe these can help too:
Yellowcard (can be depressing for me...)
K's Choice...
data.text:
Cold and Staind are probably the most depressing bands out there but maybe these can help too:

Yellowcard (can be depressing for me...)

K's Choice (Belgian band, maybe some people know them)

Eric Carmen - All By Myself (now that's a pretty depressing song, to me at least)

Some other slow sad songs but I can't really remember...

While that doesn't apply to me, you have a valid point there.

And it's not necessarily the message behind the song I was talking about, it's a slow moody ballad. It can easily be interpreted as depressing.

Yea a couple of people mentioned Hello, that song is creepy, her voice is so haunting. sends shivers down my spine

My December - Linkin Park

Let It All Out - Relient K

If I Were You - Hoobastank

That's all I can really think of. x.x

Fixed it for you.

Project 86 - Something We Can't Be

Demon Hunter - The Tide Began to Rise

I had a few more, but I forgot what they were. I'll come back and edit this when I can remember them.

Limp Bizkit - Behind blue eyes (Ah, yes...Fred Durst...very depressing... )

Creed - Don't stop Dancing

I can't seem to think of any other depressing stuf...why didn't you ask for agressive songs?...I'd know a butt-load of those

maybe some other day i'll ask for some agressive ones.

Okay well I just so happen to like a lot of depressing songs, so heres some of the most depressing ones..

Outside - Stand & Fred Durst

Yesterday - The Beatles

Most Dashboard Confessional songs

What Sarah Said - Death Cab For Cutie

Wish You Were Here - Fred Durst & Johnny Reznick

Mad World - Gary Jules (Already been mentioned)

Iris - Goo Goo Dolls (Also been mentioned)

Sometimes - Grey Daze

Kill The Messenger - Jack's Mannequin

Drugs or Me - Jimmy Eat World

Ground Xero - Mark Wakefield

Life and Death - Michael Giacchino

Suteki Da Ne - Rikki Nakano/Nobuo Uematsu

Echoes - The Rosewood Fall (Good luck finding it though)

Dirty Little Secret - Sarah McLachlan

Chasing Cars - Snow Patrol
